issue.title: [Rust] [Website] Add documentation to Arrow website
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8650](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8650). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The documentation page [1] on the Arrow site has links for C, C++, Java, Python, JavaScript, and R. It would be good do add Rust here as well, even if the docs here are brief and link to the rustdocs on docs.rs [2] (which are currently broken due to ARROW-8536 [3].

 

[1] <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/>

[2] https://docs.rs/crate/arrow/0.17.0

[3] https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8536

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8650?focusedCommentId=17133698) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
I added links to docs.rs to the main website in https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/63

Will add links to /docs/ after ARROW-8649 merges so as to avoid merge conflicts.
